generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Entity Roar Behavior
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Allows this entity to roar at another entity based on data in minecraft:anger_level. Once the anger threshold specified in minecraft:anger_level has been reached, this entity will roar for the specified amount of time, look at the other entity, apply anger boost towards it, and finally target it.

fields.title: Duration
fields.description: The amount of time to roar for.
